member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.DisablePrinting
member.summary: set to true to disable printing on the Clover Mini

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.DisableCashBack
member.summary: set to true to disable cashback on the Clover Mini

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.DisableTip
member.summary: set to true to disable tip on the Clover Mini

member.name: P:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.DisableRestartTransactionOnFail
member.summary: set to true, so when a transaction fails the Clover Mini returns to the welcome screen, otherwise it restarts the payment transaction

member.summary: overload the + operator to add a new listener

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.op_Subtraction(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector,com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnectorListener)
member.summary: overload the - operator to remove a listener

member.summary: CloverConnector constructor
member.param: A CloverDeviceConfiguration object; TestDeviceConfiguration can be used for testing

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.Initialize(com.clover.remotepay.transport.CloverDeviceConfiguration)
member.summary: Initialize the connector with a given configuration
member.param: A CloverDeviceConfiguration object; TestDeviceConfiguration can be used for testing

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.Sale(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SaleRequest)
member.summary: Sale method, aka "purchase"
member.param: A SaleRequest object containing basic information needed for the transaction
member.returns: Status code, 0 for success, -1 for failure (need to use pre-defined constants)

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.AcceptSignature(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SignatureVerifyRequest)
member.summary: If signature is captured during a Sale, this method accepts the signature as entered

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.RejectSignature(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.SignatureVerifyRequest)
member.summary: If signature is captured during a Sale, this method rejects the signature as entered

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.Auth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.AuthRequest)
member.summary: Auth method to obtain an Auth or Pre-Auth, based on the AuthRequest IsPreAuth flag

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.CaptureAuth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CaptureAuthRequest)
member.summary: Capture a previous Auth. Note: Should only be called if request's PaymentID is from an AuthResponse

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.TipAdjustAuth(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.TipAdjustAuthRequest)
member.summary: Adjust the tip for a previous Auth. Note: Should only be called if request's PaymentID is from an AuthResponse

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.VoidPayment(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VoidPaymentRequest)
member.summary: Void a transaction, given a previously used order ID and/or payment ID TBD - defining a payment or order ID to be used with a void without requiring a response from Sale()
member.param: A VoidRequest object containing basic information needed to void the transaction
member.returns: Status code, 0 for success, -1 for failure (need to use pre-defined constants)

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.VoidTransaction(com.clover.remotepay.sdk.VoidTransactionRequest)
member.summary: called when requesting a payment be voided when only the request UUID is available

member.summary: Refund a specific payment

member.summary: Manual refund method, aka "naked credit"
member.returns: Status code, 0 for success, -1 for failure (need to use pre-defined constants)

member.summary: Send a request to the server to closeout all orders.

member.summary: Cancels the device from waiting for payment card

member.summary: Show the DisplayOrder on the device. Replaces the existing DisplayOrder on the device.

member.summary: Notify the device of a DisplayLineItem being added to a DisplayOrder

member.summary: Notify the device of a DisplayLineItem being removed from a DisplayOrder

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.DisplayOrderDiscountAdded(com.clover.remote.order.DisplayOrder,com.clover.remote.order.DisplayDiscount)
member.summary: Notify device of a discount being added to the order. Note: This is independent of a discount being added to a display line item.

member.name: M:com.clover.remotepay.sdk.CloverConnector.DisplayOrderDiscountRemoved(com.clover.remote.order.DisplayOrder,com.clover.remote.order.DisplayDiscount)
member.summary: Notify the device that a discount was removed from the order. Note: This is independent of a discount being removed from a display line item.

member.summary: Remove the DisplayOrder from the device.
